name: Salomon Adv Skin 5 Set Pack - Unisex
description: Get this vest adjusted to your shape, and it will feel like an extension of your own body. 5L capacity holds your food and water for race days and mid-distance runs. It includes 2 soft bottles and has room for a 1.5L reservoir.3D air mesh on body contact surfaces wicks sweat and soft touch trims prevent friction and chafing.2 elastic sternum straps let you adjust the fit without creating pressure points.2 front stretch pockets hold included 500ml Soft Flask bottles.Front, side and chest pockets secure gear with a combination of zippered and stretch closures.Trekking pole loops hold poles diagonally so you can grab them on the go.Large rear compartment has an internal pocket.Low rear pocket accessible from either side.External insulated compartment holds a 1.5L hydration reservoir (sold separately).Safety features: integrated whistle and reflective details.Weight: 228g, 308g with accessory bottles.
